column4: Anyone with some knowledge of applications for Kubuntu have some time to talk? I'm a new user looking for some applications that might be useful for me
well what kind of applications are you looking for?
just be advised its not 100%.. it works great w/ some programs, barely with quite a fwe, and not at all w/ a whole bunch
yeah, google "Linux Alternatives".. and you should get a site that will list windows programs, and their linux alternatives
